channel.title: Bat on Noboru Saito's page
channel.description: Recent content in Bat on Noboru Saito's page

item.title: bat
item.description: bat supports pager. You can use it by setting the environment variable PAGER or BAT_PAGER. export BAT_PAGER="ov -F -H3" bat should not be wrapped (--wrap=never). If it wraps with bat, it cannot be switched to unwrap. It is better to operate with ov. bat --wrap=never README.md
